issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an app & replace the app.js with the app.js for analytics test in feature test repo
2. Follow the instructions for rightscale from this wiki page: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Analytics+Test+Plan
3. Build & run the app on BB device
4. Now generate the events using the app

Actual Result:
1. We also see all the previous analytics events everytime we see new analytics events on rightscale

2. We should only see the current or latest analytics events
fields.summary: BlackBerry : We are seeing all the previous analytics events along with the latest ones
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201305150313
